title: Managerial Competency Enhancement Course for Scientific Research Skill Development and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and work management experience
context.additional_context: Learners requiring enhanced research-based decision-making and problem-solving skills as science field managers/leaders within enterprises. Environment supports activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Applying literature analysis methods, learners systematically identify research trends in scientific fields
Using data collection and analysis tools, learners design specific procedures for solving work-related problems
Learners demonstrate communication competencies to clearly convey research findings through visual and verbal means
Through critical evaluation, learners perform processes to judge information credibility and incorporate it into decision-making

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools for Group Activities

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
